name: Bricko One
description:
Bricko One* is a simple game with a paddle, a ball, and a stack of bricks. Smash those bricks with the ball! Don't let the ball fall out the bottom of the screen!

Enjoy eleven lovingly hand-crafted levels (and some procedurally generated ones.)

No gimmicks, no distractions, and all the chaos you'd expect from a good bouncy ball :-)

* You can just call it bricko -- it's a port of my earlier "Bricko", which was inspired by classics!
